name: Herd It All
description:
Herd your flock to bound over the fence in a steady stream and put the approaching hungry wolf to sleep.

This is merely the concept for a herding puzzle game that would give me a good excuse to draw or model and animate a bunch of adorable fuzzy critters.

A very flimsy Honest Jam III entry because the jam's a good cause with good people and I had about one quarter of the free time and about -50% of the focus I expected this week.
